content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your unassigned time is an important period in your professional career at EPAM. This time allows you the opportunity to gain additional skills and contribute to EPAM by supporting internal projects, mentoring, conducting candidate technical interviews, host a Lunch & Learn and complete learning and development activities, all while actively searching for your next billable project. As finding that next project is your top priority, please review the following materials to learn how to search for a role
